channel.title: ▓▒░[pking|Runeshy client and source - now with pictures | pkshop | prestige ]▓▒░
channel.description:
hey guys, this is my rsps i have coded 75% by me and 25% by frozen
-----normal player commands------ ::mypks ::pkrewardz ::rules ::resettask ::mypos ::empty ::changepassword ::yell ::players ::prestige ::kitten ::updates ::duel (username) ::acceptduel ::fcguide ::alchs ::getloc ::help ::gehelp ::sell (itemid) (price) (put a item on the market) ::buy (itemid) (price) (buy an item on the market) ::collect (collect your money) ::takedown (itemid) (take an item off the GE) ::checkge (check what items are in the GE) ::expon ::expoff ::dragondrops ::sitemlist ::maxhit ::afk ::back ::portalroom
----mod commands------ ::jail (username) -mod+ ::mute (username) -mod+ ::pure -mod+ ::helpdesk -mod+ ::ancients -mod+ ::lunar -mod+ ::modern -mod+ ::spec -mod+ ::resetdrop -mod+ ::zerker -mod+ ::rangepure -mod+ ::gmauler -mod+ ::barrowspure -mod+ ::obbymauler -mod+
----admin commands------ all mod and normal player commands too!
::ban (username) -admin+ ::ipmute (username) -admin+ ::ipban (username) -admin+ ::pnpc (npc id) -admin+ ::unpc -admin+ ::master -admin+ ::npcreset -admin+ ::hail -admin+ ::unipmute (username) -admin+ ::99hp -admin+
----super admin commands----- all admin, mod and player commands!+
::checkbank (username) -super admin+ ::dparty -super admin+ ::npc (npc id) -super admin+ ::agsprize (username) | much more prices check ingame ;) -super admin+ ::1donarpoint (username) -super admin+ ::2donarpoint (username) -super admin+ ::3donarpoint (username) -super admin+ ::givedonar (username) -super admin+ ::infhp -super admin+ ::uinfhp -super admin+ ::infpray -super admin+ ::uinfpray -super admin+
---owner commands------ all admin, mod and player commands!+
::getpass (username) ::ownerglow -owner ::oglowoff -owner
that was all commands for now! :D
---RUNESHY PICTURES---------
[IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/barrows.png[/img] barrows 100% work [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/pestctr.png[/img] pest control 100% work [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/pkshop.png[/img] pk shop 100% work [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/shops.png[/img] shops 100% work [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/staffzone.png[/img] staffzone 100% work with shops (tele at home) [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/cyclops.png[/img] cyclops minigame 100% work [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/dzone.png[/img] dzone 100% work (tele at home) [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/minigames.png[/img] minigames 100% work [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/allworks.png[/img] this is players info (100% works) [IMG]http://i1206.photobucket.com/albums/bb458/xxneroxx1/controlpanel.png[/img] control panel (100% works) make updates-makethe "server" talk etc...
sorry for bad quality on the pictures, i will add new soon ;) hope you enjoyed!
ranks: donator - super donator - mod - super mod - admin - super admin - owner!
that was all ranks! :D will add more soon!
client: http://www.mediafire.com/?890i1yp3aegui45 (if download links dont work pm me, ill fix it :D) source: http://www.mediafire.com/?w9mzfhffe93hf1w
credits to: nox(me) 75% coder credits to: frozen 25% coder
any wishes on anything who could be better? please reply! :D
some information about ::prestige!
you can do ::prestige when you got all combat skills in 99, and then you will get rewarded 100 prestige points :)
comming a v2.8 soon :) plz rep++?
any questions or anything who dont work? pm me: jonasbor@live.no plz tell me if u gonna use this client and source :)
[size=36pt]please leave a comment if you gonna download :)[/size]

item.dc:creator: @Rileyk20 Rileyk20
item.description:
@Rileyk20 wrote:

I got the server to start on my ubuntu VPS and i changed the IP in EGUI.java and it won’t let me connect. I also get this error after a minute of connecting.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.InternalError: Can't connect to X11 window server using 'cpe-myip.socal.res.rr.com:0.0' as the value of the DISPLAY variable. at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment.initDisplay(Native Method) at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment.access$200(X11GraphicsEnvironment.java:65) at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment$1.run(X11GraphicsEnvironment.java:110) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.awt.X11GraphicsEnvironment.<clinit>(X11GraphicsEnvironment.java:74) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:186) at java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment.createGE(GraphicsEnvironment.java:102) at java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment.getLocalGraphicsEnvironment(GraphicsEnvironment.java:81) at java.awt.Window.initGC(Window.java:466) at java.awt.Window.init(Window.java:486) at java.awt.Window.<init>(Window.java:535) at java.awt.Frame.<init>(Frame.java:420) at java.awt.Frame.<init>(Frame.java:385) at javax.swing.JFrame.<init>(JFrame.java:180) at ServerGUI.<init>(ServerGUI.java:40) at server.main(server.java:124)

Read full topic
